imagem 300 300
limpar 20 20 150
color 255 255 255
circulo 50 50 30
fill 50 50 255 255 255
color 0 150 0
line 0 200 100 150
line 100 150 200 200
line 200 200 299 150
fill 299 299 0 150 0
color 255 255 255
line 200 30 205 35
line 200 35 205 30
line 140 50 143 53
line 140 53 143 50
color 180 180 50
rect 20 220 90 60
fill 21 221 180 180 50
color 100 0 0
polygon 3 0 219 130 219 65 180
fill 60 215 100 0 0
color 80 40 40
rect 80 245 20 35
fill 81 246 80 40 40
salvar esp.ppm
